body.p: To His Excellency the Governor of Kentucky, B. Magoffin Your petitioners, citizens of Estill county, would most respectfully represent to ^your^ Excellency that Joseph Dozier was Indicted & fined $20 for illegal gaming ^at the June term of the Estill Circuit Curt 1862^ That he is a very poor man with a large family -- He only bet 8 cents on the game -- He is not able to pay the debt or to replevy it & will have to go to Jail unless your he can have Executive clemency -- We hope that you will remit the fine for him.

J. B. Hinds
M B Mosely
C C Bell
J. M. Pigg C. E. C.
Robt Riddell Jr
H C Lilly
Greene B. Kelley
J H Riddell
R W. Smith
Robt Feluby
C W Friend
R G Benton
Jo B Bunn
David Wott
Wm A L B Sharp
Gov Magoffin Dear sir I hope that you will remit this fine

Estill Cir Ct
$20 } Gaming
Jos Dozier
